title: Approach to Plinth Level- Every building shall have at least one entrance accessible to the Differently abled persons and shall be indicated by proper signage
clause_text: Approach to Plinth Level- Every building shall have at least one entrance accessible to the Differently abled persons and shall be indicated by proper signage. This entrance shall be approached through a ramp together with the stepped entry.
